pageContext.claim: “We have so much evidence...we have affidavits. We have hundreds and hundreds of affidavits.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump keeps touting the "thousands" of affidavits collected by his legal team. But that does not mean much. Affidavits can be offered as evidence but they are not established as fact until a judge or jury decides they are facts. In virtually all cases, the affidavits submitted by the Trump campaign and its allies have been dismissed by judges as failing to demonstrate serious fraud.
